tag_list: futrell-autowerks, dean-futrell, audi, vw, repairs, service
overview:
Futrell Autowerks in Beaverton offers full service repair for your Volkswagen & Audi. Founded in 2002 Futrell Autowerks specializes in Audi & VW Repair, Maintenance and Daily Driver Performance Upgrades. All services performed under one roof: Wheel Alignments, Tire Sales & mounting/balancing, Air Conditioning Re-charging and Servicing are all done in house with our state of the art equipment. We also have over five service bays using the latest two post lifts designed specifically for late model European cars; the Rotary telescoping arm two post. Our showroom is well stocked with a wide selection of custom upgrades ready for immediate installation. Our waiting area features comfortable seating, WIFI, Xbox 360 entertainment complete with Forza racing simulator and Comcast Cable. Weâ€™re also centrally located on the MAX line; Willow Creek is just one block down the street. Weâ€™re proud to be a part of our community and donate a portion of our profits to important community events, organizations and charities. A scholarship fund is also available for students interested in pursuing a career in the automotive industry.

Thanks,

Dean Futrell Futrell Autowerks Inc. 503 629 5999 www.futrellautowerks.com
